overview: The film tells the story of the heroes of the detective heroes who bravely subdued a group of robbers on their way back to the team. After returning to the team smoothly, I encountered a second row of investigations and platooning wild cats. The two competed in various contests, regardless of each other. Because the entire army must be selected for the annual team to go to Ernabi, the red and blue forces in the military exercise launched a fierce battle. In a actual combat competition, the scorpion and the wild cat were accidentally captured by the Blue Army twice, and the female platoon leader Wang Xia pretended to be injured and sneaked into the Blue Army position.
title: Special Forces King
